settings.return_key_help: Make  it so that pressing the return key (the "enter" key) sends a message. If this is disabled, pressing the return key will start a new line, and the user must click the "Send message" button to send the message.
settings.show_read_receipts_help: Show a checkbox next to a message when the recipient has read it.
settings.message_recipient_background_color: Custom color for the recipient message

permissions.allow_users_to_receive_email_notificatio: Allow users to receive email notifications when they receive a private message

modal.title: Start Conversation
modal.help: Start typing a username to start a chat.
modal.help_start: Type your first message. This will be the only message you can send until {username} responds. Click the user to select a different recipient.
modal.copied: Your message has been copied to the clipboard.
modal.more_users: If you don't see the user you are looking for, they don't have private messaging set up.
modal.already: You already have a conversation with {username}.

new_private_message.subject: Message from {user}
new_private_message.youHaveReceivedNewMessage: You have received a new message from {user}!
